question: Reading Kufr unintentionally
answer:
QUESTION

As we live in nonbelivers country and here we find kufria kalimath every where, some times unintenssionaly we read those articals which will contain som words like praising theire idols ext. I have this bad habit while travelling I use to read sign boards even with out realising what I am reading. Is this reading will effect our Iman.

ANSWER
